((x1 * (t0 / (Abs(x1) ^ x1))) + t1)

c1 = 1 - 0.9556551836104719 = 0.04434481638
c2 = 3.3325642068335677
t0 = x0 * c1 - c2

c = -0.2200000142251111
t1 = (2^c + 1) x0^c + c

x1^(1-x1) * ( x0*c1 - c2 ) + (2^c + 1) x0^c + c

x[:,1]**(1 - x[:,1]) * (x[:,0]*0.04434481638 - 3.3325642068335677) + (2**(-0.2200000142251111) + 1)*x[:,0]**(-0.2200000142251111) + -0.2200000142251111
